Title: 40870 - The Health Benefits of Minimally Invasive Plastic Surgery
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 benefits of getting a minimally invasive plastic surgery. You can discuss how a certain cosmetic procedures can often improve some people's lives. You can also mention how some people gain a boost in confidence after making such a drastic change in their appearance, etc. The placement site for this article covers a wide range of topics, so write for a broad audience and be sure to focus on the health benefits of surgeries like this. You can link to your target URL by mentioning Dr. Honrado and the information he gives about the THERMlift procedure.
